content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=1.5, y=1.0)
Consists of two boilers (position x=1.5, y=1.0 and position x=1.5, y=3.0) connected by pipes, and small-electric-poles at positions (x=3.5, y=0.5) and (x=3.5, y=2.5)

### Offshore pump at position(x=-16.5, y=26.5)
Consists of an offshore pump (position x=-16.5, y=26.5) connected to a pipe at position (x=-16.5, y=25.5)

### Pipe network at position(x=1.5, y=-6.5)
Consists of multiple pipes connected to each other, forming a fluid system with id 210000

### Pipe network at position(x=3.5, y=-2.5)
Consists of multiple pipes connected to each other, forming a fluid system with id 210010

### Pipe network at position(x=-16.5, y=25.5)
Consists of two pipes connected to each other, forming a fluid system with id 210047

### Pipe network at position(x=-12.5, y=25.5)
Consists of a single pipe, forming a fluid system with id 210048

### Pipe network at position(x=-5.5, y=25.5)
Consists of a single pipe, forming a fluid system with id 210049

### Electricity network
Consists of multiple small-electric-poles connected to each other, forming an electricity group with id 21345

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure the target tile is empty before attempting to place an entity
- Make sure the entity is compatible with the tile it is being placed on

### Errors when connecting entities
- Ensure the entities are compatible with each other before attempting to connect them
- Make sure the connection points of the entities are aligned correctly

### Errors when using offshore pumps
- Ensure the offshore pump is placed in a valid location (i.e. near water)
- Make sure the offshore pump is connected to a pipe to transport the fluid

### Errors when using boilers
- Ensure the boiler is fueled correctly
- Make sure the boiler is connected to a pipe to transport the steam

### Errors when using pipes
- Ensure the pipes are connected correctly to form a valid fluid system
- Make sure the pipes are not blocked or clogged

### Errors when using small-electric-poles
- Ensure the small-electric-poles are connected correctly to form a valid electricity group
- Make sure the small-electric-poles are not overloaded or damaged
